name: Too Minnie Smoothies
description:
An adorable very light soft pink creme nail polish with different size blue and turqouise glitters. This polish also has bow and minnie glitters, giving the appearance of a blended Minnie smoothie. It's Super adorable!

All nail polishes are 3-free. in a Full size bottle contains approx. 12ml

Could be used as a topcoat or by itself in 2-3 coats.

Shake or roll bottle before using if glitter settles during shipment. 

Larger glitter is best applied using a dab motion to pick out the glitters.

name: Magic Flurry Dust
description:
Magic Flurry Dust is a gorgeous glitter topper that contains different sizes and shaped glitters with a soft pearl like finish in a beautiful color shifting base. This polish shifts from blue,purple,pink and even a bit of orangish red under certain lighting. In the picture is one coat over black (to show the best color shift) but this polish could be used over multiple colors for different looks and finishes. 

All nail polishes are 3-free. in a Full size bottle contains approx. 12ml

Best used as a topcoat.

Shake or roll bottle before using if glitter settles during shipment. 

Larger glitter is best applied using a dab motion to pick out the glitters.

name: Rich
description:
Rich is an adorable glitter topper filled with gold glitters, iridescent glitters, snowflakes and even MUSTACHE glitters! Its perfect over light and dark undies, or if you like a simple nude look you could just apply it by itself. You think the mustache glitters would be heavy but they are actually quite light in weight and a simple swirl of the brush will pick them right up!

All nail polishes are 3-free. in a Full size bottle contains approx. 12ml

Best used as a topcoat.

Shake or roll bottle before using if glitter settles during shipment.

Larger glitter is best applied using a dab motion to pick out the glitters.

name: Dolly Topper
description:
The Dolly Topper is an adorable glitter bomb with all types of different size glitters and even adorable Bow shaped glitters that are easy for your brush to pick up! Dolly Topper has a gorgeous iridescent sparkle that shifts from blurple to pinkish orange. Add the Dolly Topper to any solid color base and watch it work its magic!

All nail polishes are 3-free. in a Full size bottle contains approx. 12ml

Best used as a topcoat.

Shake or roll bottle before using if glitter settles during shipment. 

Larger glitter is best applied using a dab motion to pick out the glitters.

name: Space Cadet
description:
This polish is a beautiful special effects polish that pops once applied over dark colors. Its a holo topper but also a multi colored sparkle effect that shifts from blue to purple to pink and even more colors depending on the lighting (theres a hidden beautiful glaze beneath all the sparkle). The holo added gives the space effect as if you are look into outer space. This is a must have! Feel free to apply it over other base colors and watch the results shift before your eyes!

All nail polishes are 3-free. in a Full size bottle contains approx. 12ml

Best used as a topcoat.

Shake or roll bottle before using if glitter settles during shipment.

name: Unicorn Etiquette
description:
Unicorn Etiqutte is a BEAUTIFUL holo/multi colored  effect topper that shifts to teal, blue, purple, and pink. You may even catch a bit of a gold orangish glaze as well under certain lighting at different angles. This is one Generous coat over 2 coats of black and a glossy topcoat.

All nail polishes are 3-free. in a Full size bottle contains approx. 12ml

Best used as a topcoat.

Shake or roll bottle before using.

name: Unicorn Bff's
description:
Unicorn Bff's is the perfect polish describing what it would look like if 2 Unicorns were best friends stuffed into a bottle. This polish has beautiful soft yet vibrant colors and I even cut some of the locks of a unicorn and tossed them into the bottle as well. There is also a sparkle finish to this polish that shifts from a beautiful violet pink to a blue puple finish. (so feel free to try it over a dark base)

All nail polishes are 3-free. in a Full size bottle contains approx. 12ml

Best used as a topcoat

Shake or roll bottle before using if glitter settles during shipment. 

Larger glitter is best applied using a dab motion to pick out the glitters.

name: She has fangs
description:
This is a beautiful dark plum polish that shifts indigo blue to burnt orange to a slight pink color depending on what type of light you are under. Its very soft yet very bold, feeling a bit vampy? Then this shade is just for you. In the picture is 3 coats with no base coat or top coat.

All nail polishes are 3-free. in a Full size bottle contains approx. 12ml

Best used as a topcoat.

Shake or roll bottle before using  settling occurs during shipment.

name: Tinkerbell was here
description:
This polish is the result of whatI feel tinkerbell would leave when she flies away. It a variety of different glitters and shapes in a clear base with a beautiful duochorme shimmer. Its stunning! Watch it sparkle in the sun! In the picture is one coat over a blue base and pastel purple base.

Photo Courtesy of http://glitterfists.blogspot.com/

All nail polishes are 3-free. in a Full size bottle contains approx. 12ml

Best used as a topcoat

Shake or roll bottle before using if glitter settles during shipment. 

Larger glitter is best applied using a dab motion to pick out the glitters.

name: The Empress
description:
The Empress is basically a beautiful multicolored effect topper that changes from blue,purple,and pink under certain lighting. The effect will show up even better when used over dark undies. This polish has different shaped glitters along with big gold square shaped glitters. Once applied go snag your crown! YOU EMPRESS!

All nail polishes are 3-free. in a Full size bottle contains approx. 12ml

Best used as a topcoat.

Shake or roll bottle before using if glitter settles during shipment.

 Larger glitter is best applied using a dab motion to pick out the glitters.

name: The After Party
description:
This polish has a variety of different color neon glitters and shapes in a clear base with a holographic  fairy dust finish. Watch it sparkle in the sun! In the picture is one coat over a white base.

Photo Courtesy of http://glitterfists.blogspot.com/

All nail polishes are 3-free. in a Full size bottle contains approx. 12ml

Best used as a topcoat

Shake or roll bottle before using if glitter settles during shipment. 

Larger glitter is best applied using a dab motion to pick out the glitters.

name: Teal Macaron
description:
Teal Macaron is a teal cream polish with dark flakes scattered thoughout that sparkle under certain lighting. This polish gives the appearance of the beautiful imperfections of the surface of a macaron. This polish is sheer enough to put one coat on top of any undie you choose and still see the color underneath.

All nail polishes are 3-free. in a Full size bottle contains approx. 12ml

Could be used as a topcoat or by itself in 3 coats.

Shake or roll bottle before using if glitter settles during shipment.

name: Spring Year Round
description:
Spring Year Round is a beautiful glitter topper that is perfect if you want a settle soft look. This polish also has a duo finish that shines from a beautiful light green to a blue finish so depending on what undie you choose to use the darker the base the more vivid the effect will be.

All nail polishes are 3-free. in a Full size bottle contains approx. 12ml

Best used as a topcoat

Shake or roll bottle before using if glitter settles during shipment. 

Larger glitter is best applied using a dab motion to pick out the glitters.

name: Orange you a doll
description:
Orange you a doll is a pastel light orange cream polish with different size round glitters and iridescent glitters. This polish is perfect for a simple over any undie mani or by itself! Either way it has a very elegant shimmer finish!

All nail polishes are 3-free. in a Full size bottle contains approx. 12ml

Could be used as a topcoat or by itself in 2-3 coats.

Shake or roll bottle before using if glitter settles during shipment. 

Larger glitter is best applied using a dab motion to pick out the glitters.

name: Ocean Jewel
description:
Ocean Jewel is a stunning crelly polish in a aqua like blue base with a hidden enchanting blue effect that appears under different lighting. The polish also contains round glitters and slices along with gold inside. This polish is great by itself or over any undie of your choice.

All nail polishes are 3-free. in a Full size bottle contains approx. 12ml

Could be used as a topcoat or by itself in 2-3 coats.

Shake or roll bottle before using if glitter settles during shipment. 

Larger glitter is best applied using a dab motion to pick out the glitters.

name: Mr. Gold
description:
Mr. Gold is just an absolutely stunning smooth and very reflective(like a mirror or scales) glitter topper. Its very elegant yet very light on top of the nail, while most flake toppers you come across are prickly and stick up on the nail this one has a smooth flat finish! It also has gorgeous hex tossed in the mix that give off a gold shine! The combo does not disappoint.

All nail polishes are 3-free. in a Full size bottle contains approx. 12ml

Best used as a topcoat

Shake or roll bottle before using if glitter settles during shipment. 

Larger glitter is best applied using a dab motion to pick out the glitters.

name: A Black Unicorn!?
description:
Have you ever seen a Black Unicorn before? Neither have I! But if I did see a Black Unicorn this is what I imagine it would look like in a bottle! This polish has a minty green, pink, and blue shimmer finish so depending on what lighting you're under you will see different effects.

Photo Courtesy of http://glitterfists.blogspot.com/

All nail polishes are 3-free. in a Full size bottle contains approx. 12ml

Could be used as a topcoat or by itself in 2-3 coats.

Shake or roll bottle before using if glitter settles during shipment. 

Larger glitter is best applied using a dab motion to pick out the glitters.

name: Couture Pink
description:
Couture Pink is a slight cream/jelly polish with a GORGEOUS blue effect. This polish also has a little bit of everything including skull glitters! This polish is beautiful by itself or on top of any undie of your choice (especially with the effect it gives off!).

All nail polishes are 3-free. in a Full size bottle contains approx. 12ml

Could be used as a topcoat or by itself in 2-3 coats.

Shake or roll bottle before using if glitter settles during shipment. 

Larger glitter is best applied using a dab motion to pick out the glitters.

name: Cotton Candy Glaze
description:
Cotton Candy Glaze is a beautiful effect topper with a few glitters here and there in a light purple SOFT holo sheer base. This polish is definitely soft and easy on the eyes and yet very fun with the different shape glitters inside. Wear it by itself for a soft elegant look or under any undie of your choice and watch the effects change!

All nail polishes are 3-free. in a Full size bottle contains approx. 12ml

Best used as a topcoat

Shake or roll bottle before using if glitter settles during shipment.

name: Death by Ice cream
description:
You love Icecream so much that it kills you! Yep thats the definition of this polish. This polish has a frosty finish but don't fooled, that frost that you see is actually a multi colored shimmer finish. Depending on what undie you use as a base color will effect what shimmer you see under certain lighting. This polish literally has many faces (duo shimmer effects). In the picture is 2 coats over a silver base.

Photo Courtesy of http://glitterfists.blogspot.com/

All nail polishes are 3-free. in a Full size bottle contains approx. 12ml

Could be used as a topcoat or by itself in 2-3 coats.

Shake or roll bottle before using if glitter settles during shipment. 

Larger glitter is best applied using a dab motion to pick out the glitters.

name: Dizzy Unicorn
description:
This polish pretty much has every color glitter you can think of except black in a clear base with a beautiful duo chrome finish. In the picture is one coat over a white base and a glossy top coat.

Photo Courtesy of http://glitterfists.blogspot.com/

All nail polishes are 3-free. in a Full size bottle contains approx. 12ml

Best used as a topcoat

Shake or roll bottle before using if glitter settles during shipment. 

Larger glitter is best applied using a dab motion to pick out the glitters.

name: Genie in a bottle
description:
This polish is basically the rainbow in a bottle with iridescent yummy goodness in a clear base with a Beautiful duo chrome finish.

Photo Courtesy of http://glitterfists.blogspot.com/

All nail polishes are 3-free. in a Full size bottle contains approx. 12ml

Best used as a topcoat

Shake or roll bottle before using if glitter settles during shipment.

 Larger glitter is best applied using a dab motion to pick out the glitters.

name: Land of Rainbow's
description:
Land of Rainbow's is an adorable slight sheer milky white polish with colorful glitters and shapes in a bottle. This is adorabe by itself or on top of any undie of your choice!

All nail polishes are 3-free. in a Full size bottle contains approx. 12ml

Could be used as a topcoat or by itself in 2-3 coats.

Shake or roll bottle before using if glitter settles during shipment. 

Larger glitter is best applied using a dab motion to pick out the glitters.
